members.desc:
(c: Card)

Create a new empty effect whose owner is card c.

(e: Effect, f: function)

Sets the target property.

(c: Card, e: Effect[, forced: boolean = false])

Registers the effect e to c, returns the global id of the effect, and set the Handler of e to c
By default, if c is registered with the effect of immune e then the registration will fail
If forced is true, the immune effect of c against e will not be checked.
